title: guru kula maNiyE un tanjam tanjam
sahitya:
guru kula maNiyE un tanjam tanjam


caraNam 1    karu vazhi nADA karuNai nayandennai undan kaDaik-kaNNeDuttu mukham pArum pArumayyA
    caraNam 2    anitya samsdAram mAyA vikAram arindum marandOm sukham pOdum pOdumayyA
    caraNam 3    pAvattaiyOTTi divya paravoLi kATTi un bhajanai sukhattil manam tArum tArumayyA
